reviewText:
GREAT STORY LINE BUT UNFORTUNATELY THE COMPANY WHO PUT THIS OUT HAD VERY BAD SUBTITLES FOR ENGLISH...IT WAS
SOMETIMES HARD TO FOLLOW THE STORY LINE...WERE IT NOT FOR THE GREAT ACTOR WHO THE WAS MAIN HERO...I WOULD HAVE
RETURNED IT...BUT HE IS ONE OF MY FAVORITE AND WILL WATCH IT OVER AND OVER BECAUSE OF HIM....!
